extendedInfo.description: Easy SG Transport is a free, simple and useful Singapore buses and MRT arrival time application with notifications, maps and real time traffic conditions.âââThe first app of its kind to design with the blind and visually handicapped people in mind. Now checked bus timing will be read out to the user when phone is in talk back mode.ââââââSet notification for bus arrival at preceding bus stop by pressing exclamation mark icon and you can continue to use other apps like Facebook, browser and email, the system will keep updating you with arrival time of selected bus until it arrives at preceding bus stop.âââFeatures:â check bus arrival times for SBS and SMRT buses.â check MRT arrival times for SMRT trains.â Google's real time traffic status can be seen on the maps.â bus timing read out for blind and visually handicapped people in talk back mode.â nearby stops and stops along a road can be seen on the Mapâ current location can be seen on a bus route by clicking map icon in FAV. page.â easy to use add/delete favourite iconsâ useful bus arrival time notification minutely until it arrives at preceding stop [beta]â show nearby bus stopsâ search buses and roadsâ swipe to access different tabsâ neat user interfaceGoogle's real time traffic status can be seen on the maps.	Green: more than 80 kilometers per hour	Yellow: 40 - 80 kilometers per hour	Red: less than 40 kilometers per hour	Red/Black: very slow	Gray: no data currently availableIf you think the application useful, please leave a good rating and some comments.Thank you for using Easy SG Transport and have a pleasant  journey.If you encounter any crashes, please click the report button to be able to improve the app.For feedback for improvement and bug report,cutetechno@gmail.comPlease like the Facebook Page @http://www.facebook.com/EasySgTransportKnown Issues:- Nearby tab not refreshed. Some Android 4.X.X OS version has some problems with map and location issue. Other similar apps like mine are also having the problem only Google Map app is working fine. You can temporarily fix it by restarting the device.

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.comment: Loads of handy features and more accurate than other similar products. The bus tracking/reminder feature is cool, too.
reviews.author: Freddie Wu

reviews.title: Lately the nearby doesny work
reviews.comment: 3 Star because lately the nearby doesn\'t work, press refresh, it just show refreshing nearby stop. Please fix it.
reviews.author: Samuel Ng

reviews.title: Bus app
reviews.comment: One of the better  app that I have used for andriod.  Tried a few other app and only this more user friendly and adaptable.
reviews.author: Choa xin yu

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Keep it up! You might wanna improve on the appearance inside the app
reviews.author: Chua Shi Hui

reviews.title: Excellent Apps
reviews.comment: The best apps, I love it. I can set notification for bus arrival timing. Thank you very much ^_^\302\245
reviews.author: Lily Lim

reviews.title: Prettygood
reviews.comment: It would have been better if there was an option to track the route as well.. overall I liked and found very useful
reviews.author: Sudhanshu Pratap

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: I am so impressed by this app, light weight and packed with useful features. Best of all, it\'s reliable and free
reviews.author: Ye Xuzhi

reviews.title: Outstanding
reviews.comment: Highly reliable, sophisticated app with a beautiful, user-friendly interface.
reviews.author: James Lee

reviews.title: Simple and good but room for improvement
reviews.comment: Really easy to check out bus arrival times, though some inaccuracies at times. Will be better if it allows you to search via bus stop number, or press on the bus stop number for certain bus to access entire bus stop\'s buses. Good job nonetheless!
reviews.author: Jason Seng

reviews.title: I like this app but...
reviews.comment: I like this app, is good but could you add a refresh button or something similar to add new bus number when there\'s a new bus added to certain bus stop? Thanks in advanced.
reviews.author: Eddy Soo

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note II LTE
reviews.comment: This is the only app I know that features bus and mrt ETA.   Would give a 4 or 5 if developers can fix the FC that keeps happening from time to time.  Also, sometimes for some bus stations the time is a bit advance.  Anyhow thanks to the developers.  Please fix the FC.
reviews.author: Jorge Raymund Maravilla

reviews.title: Fantastico Apps
reviews.comment: Very details and user friendly apps and also almost accuracy bus arrival time..good job:)
reviews.author: Dior dna

reviews.title: Awesome & Best UIE app!
reviews.comment: It\'s never easier without this app for my daily commute on bus or even train.  I love the function of every min reminder of my bus! Most important it is fast loading:)
reviews.author: janson lee

reviews.title: Its really good and handy
reviews.comment: Thank you
reviews.author: Hamza Ameer

reviews.comment: Its s great app! Although recently there\'s been some issues with punctuality, I still think it\'s very minor as compared to the benefits it\'s been providing. It really makes travelling around a bliss. I suppose nothing can be perfect in this imperfect world we are living in. Thank you for this great app.
reviews.author: Nellie Ng

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It will be better if this app can search by using bus stop number...will give 5 star if this added.
reviews.author: Teo GenJing

reviews.title: Sg bus
reviews.comment: Good!! Best of all..
reviews.author: Charlene Teh

reviews.title: SG Buses are not as user friendly as u
reviews.comment: Keep it updated.
reviews.author: John Khoo

reviews.title: Gd app
reviews.comment: Gd app and quite stable and accurate
reviews.author: shu min How

reviews.title: Does not work ~ becoming worst !
reviews.comment: The apps no longer able to provide timing, if it does, the timing is not accurate ! Case in point :unable to provide timing for service 31 and 59. Please fix it !
reviews.author: Dominic Foo
